conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a poetry movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I think I have just the thing for you! Have you considered "Hitch" (2005)? It's a clever and charming film that explores the intersection of poetry and storytelling, as two masters of their craft - Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut - meet and discuss the art of filmmaking. With an all-star cast, including Will Smith and Eva Mendes, this movie is sure to delight!
